root.sql: SELECT t.id, t.vin, t.iccid FROM bs_vehicle t
SELECT t.vehicleid, t.faultunit, t.faultvalue, t.starttime, t.endtime FROM bs_vehiclefault t
SELECT t.id, t.factoryid, t.faultunit, t.faultvalue, t.name, t.description FROM bs_vehiclefaultcode t

SELECT t.vehicleid, s.id alarmid, s.name, s.alarmlevel, s.batterymaxvoltage, s.batteryminvoltage, s.batterymaxtemp, s.batterymintemp, n.userid, n.sms, n.email, n.site FROM rel_alarmstrategy_vehicle t INNER JOIN bs_vehiclealarmstrategy s ON s.id = t.alarmid INNER JOIN bs_vehiclealarmnotice n ON n.alarmid = s.id ORDER BY t.vehicleid
